Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to validating absentee ballots
Summary: Relates to validating absentee ballots; relates to when absentee ballot envelopes and absentee ballots are examined to determine the validity of such absentee ballots; allows for the surrender of absentee ballots in certain situations; authorizes poll watchers to be present at meetings related to examining absentee ballot envelopes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to validating absentee ballots
